unnormalised: Breaking news! Dr. Meena Sharma just got appointed as the new head of cardiology at AIIMS, Delhi. Big congrats to her! Everyone's saying she's the best in the field. She did her MBBS from Maulana Azad Medical College and then specialized in cardiology, so she's totally qualified.
normalised: Breaking news! Doctor Meena Sharma just got appointed as the new head of cardiology at A-I-I-M-S, Delhi. Big congrats to her! Everyone's saying she's the best in the field. She did her M-B-B-S from Maulana Azad Medical College and then specialized in cardiology, so she's totally qualified.

unnormalised: Word on the street is that she's planning some big changes to the department, like getting the latest machines and starting new training programs for young docs. They are saying the hospital is gonna be buzzing with activity.
normalised: Word on the street is that she's planning some big changes to the department, like getting the latest machines and starting new training programs for young docs. They are saying the hospital is gonna be buzzing with activity.
